sentences.en: a novel about a family’s struggle on the American frontier
sentences.cn: 描写一家人在美国边远地区奋斗的小说

sentences.en: Andy Canvin is a pioneer on the strange frontier of DNA genealogy.
sentences.cn: 安迪-卡文是DNA谱系学奇异前沿的先锋人物.

sentences.en: He had been decoyed across the frontier and arrested as a spy.
sentences.cn: 他被诱骗越境,然后被当作间谍逮捕.

sentences.en: He wrote a book descriptive of the frontier provinces.
sentences.cn: 他写了一本描写边疆各省的专著.

sentences.en: Lille is close to the frontier between France and Belgium.
Our frontier guards held up under fierce enemy attack.
sentences.cn: 我们的边防战士在敌人猛烈进攻下巍然不动.

sentences.en: push back the frontiers (=discover new things)
That is the question of the New Frontier.
sentences.cn: 这就是“新边疆”向我们提出的问题.

sentences.en: the frontier between the land of the Saxons and that of the Danes
sentences.cn: 撒克逊人土地和古斯堪的纳维亚人土地的边界

sentences.en: The frontier has worked him over inside.
sentences.cn: 边疆生活已使他的思想起了很大变化.

sentences.en: The frontier station was starved for food and water.
The life of the Reindeer men was a frontier life.
sentences.cn: 驯鹿时代人的生活是一种边区生活.

sentences.en: The minority of us are confronted with difficulty in the frontier of the major.
sentences.cn: 我们少数人在该专业尖端领域面临困难。

sentences.en: There were very few border controls on the southwestern frontier.
sentences.cn: 西南国界上没几个边境检查站.

sentences.en: They massed well - equipped troops on the frontier.
sentences.cn: 他们在边境上集结了装备精良的军队.

sentences.en: Troops are massing ( are being massed ) on the frontier.
Troops are massing on the frontier.
Warehouses at the frontier between the two countries fill up with sacks of rice and flour.
sentences.cn: 两国边境地区的仓库里堆满了一袋袋的大米和面粉。

trans.tran_cn: 边界，前沿，新领域，（美国）西部边疆
